name: Wez Furlong
biography: Wez Furlong is the Chief Software Architect at Message Systems. In the PHP world, Furlong is a PHP Core developer, the so-called “King of PECL,” the PHP Extension Community Library, and helps to maintain the php.net server infrastructure. Furlong has authored and maintains a number of PHP extensions, and designed and implemented the PHP Streams and database layers. Furlong currently resides in Maryland with his wife, son, and dog.
